I

ID - Static variable in class MPC.sym
 
idMap - Static variable in class MPC.TokenId
the StringMap used to hold all identifiers (and keywords), so that we can share the String (and the TokenId/TokenKey) when the name is the same
IF - Static variable in class MPC.sym
 
inChar - Variable in class MPC.ScanInStream
the next input character; it is a short so that we can mark end of file as well (by using 0400).
inChar() - Method in class MPC.ScanInStream
accessor to observe the current input character
indent - Variable in class MPC.MPCStream
indentation, express as number of columns of spaces to print when requested to do so
indentStep - Static variable in class MPC.MPCStream
the amount, in columns, by which to increase/decrease indentation when we change by one indentation step
inFileName - Variable in class MPC.MPCContext
Input file name
info - Variable in class MPC.TokenId
arbitrary info, settable by client of this class
init_actions() - Method in class MPC.Parser
Action encapsulation object initializer.
initClassTable() - Static method in class MPC.MPCScanner
routine to initialize the characters class table given the data immediately above here
initStates() - Static method in class MPC.MPCScanner
This static initializer sets up the State transitions, after the above enums are initialized.
InputPos - Class in MPC
A class for packing an source input position (line, column) into a single Java int.
InputPos() - Constructor for class MPC.InputPos
 
inStr - Variable in class MPC.ScanInStream
the underlying character InputStream
INT - Static variable in class MPC.sym
 
IntMap<E> - Class in MPC
This is essentially a variant of HashMap for our purposes: (1) We want to be able to look up based on an int, thus avoid making unnecessary objects; (2) Since we are implementing this ourselves, we implement only the functionality we need.
IntMap() - Constructor for class MPC.IntMap
constructor that builds a map with the default number of hash chains
IntMap(int) - Constructor for class MPC.IntMap
constructor that builds a map with the specified number of hash chains
intMap - Static variable in class MPC.TokenInt
We keep each TokenInt in this table, with the key being its Java int value, so that we get the same object for each instance of the same value.
IntMap.IntMapEntry<E> - Class in MPC
Nested, but not inner, class for entries in the map; we will have buckets that start chains of these entries that have the same hash code for their key
IntMapEntry(int, E) - Constructor for class MPC.IntMap.IntMapEntry
the obvious constructor
inToken() - Method in class MPC.ScanInStream
indicate that we are now in a token (we may already be so)
iterator() - Method in class MPC.StringMap
supports iterating over the entries in the StringMap
